description: Static utility website converting between macOS/BSD LSCOLORS (22-char) and GNU LS_COLORS (dircolors-style). TypeScript, Vite, zero runtime deps. Hosted on GitHub Pages.

tasks.title: Init repo, package.json, tsconfig, Vite, Vitest
tasks.details: package.json with dev/build/test/preview scripts, tsconfig (strict ES2022+DOM), Vite config (base=/lscolors/), Vitest, index.html, src/main.ts, .gitignore

tasks.title: Implement lscolors.ts converter module
tasks.details: Port user-provided TypeScript module into src/lscolors.ts. Exports: BsdSlot type, Style interface, parseLscolors, stringifyLscolors, parseLsColors, stringifyLsColors, parseSgr, stringifySgr, lscolorsToLsColors, lsColorsToLscolors. Key: 22-char LSCOLORS with 11 slots (di,ln,so,pi,ex,bd,cd,su,sg,tw,ow), BSD chars a-h/A-H/x mapped to ANSI codes, 256-color approximation via Euclidean RGB distance. Done when: strict TS compiles, all exports typed, no any.

tasks.title: Unit tests for converter module
tasks.details: Vitest tests covering: parseLscolors valid/invalid, stringifyLscolors round-trip, LSCOLORS→LS_COLORS with known defaults, LS_COLORS→LSCOLORS reverse, 256-color approximation, edge cases (empty, all-default, bold/underline ignored), round-trip identity for basic colors.

tasks.title: HTML/CSS layout with inputs and swap button
tasks.details: index.html + src/main.ts + src/style.css. Title/header, LSCOLORS text input (maxlength 22), LS_COLORS textarea, swap/convert direction indicator, error/validation containers, clean minimal monospace design.

tasks.title: GitHub Actions workflow for Pages deployment
tasks.details: .github/workflows/deploy.yml. Trigger on push to master. checkout, setup node, npm ci, npm run build, deploy dist/ to GitHub Pages.

tasks.title: Wire live bidirectional conversion + validation
tasks.details: Typing in LSCOLORS input live-converts to LS_COLORS and vice versa. Invalid input shows inline error without updating other field. Swap button toggles source direction.

tasks.title: Color preview swatches for each slot
tasks.details: Grid/table showing 11 BSD slots with sample text colored by fg on bg. ANSI→CSS color mapping. xterm256→RGB for 256-color preview. Updates live as user types.

tasks.title: Copy-to-clipboard and permalink via URL hash
tasks.details: Copy button next to each output. URL hash encodes current state. On load, read hash and populate fields.

tasks.title: Responsive design and mobile layout
tasks.details: Stack inputs vertically on narrow screens. Readable fonts. Touch-friendly buttons. Preview grid wraps. Usable at 375px.
